An economy that only works for those at the very top is an economy that is broken. In order to address the increase in income inequality, we need a national commitment to good-paying jobs, affordable childcare, and paid family leave.

The Iran deal placed Iran’s nuclear program under international sponsorship and put us in the unsustainable position of having to defend that program. There is no fix for this. @POTUS should withdraw from this disastrous deal.
